message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high quality and unique features, I think it's worth more than $150 to you. Considering its value, I propose a price of $200 for the product. I'm confident this investment will pay off in terms of convenience and efficiency. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further or making an offer.

I'm interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $180 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering the features and quality you mentioned.
